title: Understanding the Science of Addiction: How Recovery Rewires the Brain
author: Dr. Sarah Martinez, Neuroscientist
description: An evidence-based exploration of how addiction affects brain chemistry and how recovery processes help restore healthy neural pathways.
summary: Learn about the neuroplasticity of recovery and how your brain heals during the journey to sobriety.

title: Building Resilience: 10 Daily Practices for Sustained Recovery
author: Recovery Connect Team
description: Practical strategies for developing emotional resilience and maintaining long-term recovery through daily intentional practices.
summary: Discover simple yet powerful daily habits that strengthen your recovery foundation.

title: Navigating Triggers: A Comprehensive Guide to Recognition and Response
author: Lisa Chen, LCSW
description: Learn to identify personal triggers and develop healthy coping mechanisms to navigate challenging situations in recovery.
summary: Master the art of trigger recognition and build a toolkit of healthy responses.

title: The Power of Peer Support in Recovery: Building Your Support Network
author: Michael Rodriguez, Peer Support Specialist
description: Explore the crucial role of peer support in recovery and learn how to build meaningful connections with others on similar journeys.
summary: Understand why peer support is essential and how to cultivate healing relationships.

title: Mindfulness in Recovery: Practical Meditation Techniques for Daily Life
author: Amanda Thompson, Mindfulness Instructor
description: Discover how mindfulness and meditation can support your recovery journey with practical techniques you can use anywhere.
summary: Learn accessible mindfulness practices designed specifically for recovery.

title: Family Recovery: Healing Relationships After Addiction
author: Dr. Jennifer Walsh, Family Therapist
description: A guide for both individuals in recovery and their family members on rebuilding trust and creating healthy family dynamics.
summary: Repair and strengthen family relationships through understanding and communication.

title: Nutrition and Recovery: Fueling Your Body for Healing
author: Rachel Green, Registered Dietitian
description: Learn how proper nutrition supports recovery, boosts energy, and helps restore physical health after addiction.
summary: Discover the connection between nutrition and recovery success.

title: Managing Anxiety and Depression in Early Recovery
author: Dr. Robert Kim, Psychiatrist
description: Understanding dual diagnosis and effective strategies for managing mental health conditions alongside addiction recovery.
summary: Learn to address mental health challenges as part of your recovery journey.
